thread.title: The Circuit de la Sarthe elected “Favorite Monument of the French”
thread.title_full: The Circuit de la Sarthe elected “Favorite Monument of the French”

author: adaline.
title: The Circuit de la Sarthe elected “Favorite Monument of the French”
text: [Sarthe](/tag/Sarthe)elected “Favorite Monument of the French” [](https://euro.dayfr.com/content/uploads/2024/09/19/843f3bf2aa.jpg) As a candidate from [Pays de la Loire](/tag/Pays+de+la+Loire), the 24 Hours of [Le Mans](/tag/Le+Mans) circuit won the final of [France](/tag/France) 3’s show “The French People’s Favorite Monument” against 13 other sites still in the running. The route follows the Sedan Castle. The Circuit de la [Sarthe](/tag/Sarthe) elected “Favorite Monument of the French” In all, 28 monuments were selected to compete for the coveted title of “Favorite monument of the French 2024” brought back into play by the TV show “Favorite village of the French” which aims to highlight the richness of the cultural, historical and architectural heritage of the regions of France. “It is an immense honour and a great source of pride to receive this title of Favourite Monument of the French”declares Pierre Fillon, president of the Automobile Club of the West. “The 24 Hours of Le Mans circuit is an icon of our sport and our region, which welcomed more than a million people last year.” “I would first like to sincerely thank Dominique Le Mèner, President of the Sarthe Departmental Council and the Syndicat Mixte du Circuit des 24 Heures du Mans, Christelle Morançais, President of the Pays de la Loire Regional Council, as well as Stéphane Le Foll, Mayor of Le Mans and President of Le Mans Métropole. A big thank you also to all the people who voted for the circuit as well as Stéphane Bern.” “Representing the Pays de la Loire region, the legendary 24 Hours of Le Mans circuit was voted the French people’s favorite monument for 2024, demonstrating our compatriots’ attachment to the greatest…Read more on Sport Auto
